content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a detailed solution.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure appears to be a train-like construction
- It consists of 9 blocks in total
- It has 2 layers: base layer and upper layer
- The base layer has red arch blocks forming the "wheels" and foundation
- The upper layer has various colored blocks (yellow, blue, green, orange) forming the "body" and "cabin"

Block Selection and Structure Description:
Base layer (bottom to top):
- 2 red arch blocks (indices 1 and 2) for the wheels
- 2 yellow semicircular blocks (indices 14 and 15) on top of the arches
Upper layer blocks:
- 1 blue cube block (index 5) on the left
- 2 tall yellow rectangular blocks (index 11) in the middle
- 1 orange cube block (index 6) on the right
- 2 green rectangular blocks (index 10) on the far right

Assembly Order:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1
    Step2: Move block with index 2
    Step3: Move block with index 14
    Step4: Move block with index 15
    Step5: Move block with index 5
    Step6: Move block with index 11
    Step7: Move block with index 11
    Step8: Move block with index 6
    Step9: Move block with index 10
}

This assembly sequence builds from bottom to top, left to right, ensuring stability of the structure. The base is constructed first, followed by the upper elements.
